page.title: 17EMPLOYMENT IN SOUTH ABINGDON
page.content: I have done a survey of employment.I asked every child in our school where their Mum and Dad worked.Here are the results.(survey by Michelle Prior,11) FEMALES MALES PROFESSIONAL 8 13 MANAGEMENT 0 3 SECRETARIES 1 0 CLERICAL 0 0 BUILDING 0 3 ENGINEERING 0 7 SEMI-SKILLED 10 55 UN-SKILLED 65 24 HOUSEWIVES 43 - UNEMPLOYED 0 5 It can be seen that most of the females are employed in un-skilled work and most of the males in semi-skilled work. The results add up to 237,giving an unemployment rate,amongst males,of 5%. We feel that these figures reflect the "working class" nature of S.Abingdon.
